name: r2p
short_description:
R2p is a personal project with the goal to help reproduce other researchers to reproduce my results for accurate and fair comparison. 

But why don't you just post your code on github, sourceforge or zip it and distribute it in your webpage?

The code posted on this platform is special! It is full documented. (Unfortunately, this is not a standard in research!) This allows to transform it into a website thanks to the mat2doc system. Mat2doc is a tool that provides a fast and simple way to publish documentation directly from the mat file.

R2p is developed at LTS2/EPFL, Signal Processing Laboratory 2 of the federal swiss school of Lausanne.
